column5: Anyone have predictions on ice out in Red Lake area. What has the weather been lately? Thanks in advance.Duffy
Go to www. ontarioweather.com, scroll down to Red Lake. gives youdaily weather and a week in advance. 50 today.
Ice will be out within 14 days. Small lakes are breaking up now and Red Lake opens a week later
Frank, Thanks for the info.!!! When do you think the lakes north of Red lake will go out? Thanks again.Duffy
All lakes have open water now. All ice gone
>All lakes have open water now. >All ice gone If all ice is gone then go fishing you lucky son of a gun!!!! Thanks for the info. Take care.Duffy
